name: @evolv/javascript-sdk
description: This is the official JavaScript client for the Evolv Technologies optimization platform.

scripts.staging:release: npm run deploy:version:s3 && npm run deploy:next:s3 && npm run deploy:next:npm
scripts.release: npm run deploy:version:s3 && npm run deploy:latest:s3 && npm run deploy:latest:npm
scripts.deploy:next:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/index.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/next/index.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/docs/  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/next/docs/ --recursive --acl public-read && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths /javascript-sdk/releases/next/*
scripts.deploy:version:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/index.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/$SEM_VER/index.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/docs/  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/$SEM_VER/docs/ --recursive --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:latest:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/index.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/latest/index.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/docs/  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/javascript-sdk/releases/latest/docs/ --recursive --acl public-read && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths /javascript-sdk/releases/latest/*
scripts.deploy:next:npm: npm version $SEM_VER --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --tag next --access public
